markdownRemark.html:
December 21, 2016

Audit report on: https://www.staging.vets.gov Main Page

  • Navigation bar must be at the top

  • Heading structure is not correct. Page needs to begin with H1 and goes all the way to H6. Content information should be tagged as headings. Section titles should be tagged as headings.

  • Screen reader reads definition lists. It has DT(definition term) and DL(definition list) tags. This is not correct link structure.

  • For footers you need to use proper tags. This would have bunch of links inside of a footer.

  • There is a link inside of a banner which could be confusing to a user.

  • Graphic needs to be tagged correctly

  • Help document is missing along with contact information.

  • U.S Department of Veterans Affairs need to read as a logo.

Healthcare Page:

  • Same banner issue. VA.Vets.gov should not be a link. It should read as VA.Vets.gov logo.

  • Same problem with the list. Screen reader is reading definition list.

  • Need proper footer marker

Refill Prescriptions:

  • Heading starts off with H5 before H1. Incorrect heading structure. Tag should go from H1 to H6.

  • In process (refill status) button is non-functional. Screen reader does not alert the user and user is also unable to exit out of the pop-up box. Focus does not return back so it is confusing for the reader and for the user to get out of the pop-up

  • There is a Sort by list. It is scripting issue.

  • View History:

  • Scripting problem for the link “Next”. It just reads the link as a text.

  • Screen reader does not read the pop up box for “In process”
